00073 /* Initializes interval size, output directory and output name, 
00074    as well as the basic block hash table */
00075 void init_bb_tracker (char* m_dir_name, char* m_out_name, long m_interval_size);
00076  
00077 
00078 /* Called at each CTRL op, marking the end of a basic block.  The pc of the last 
00079    instruction indexes into the basic block hash, and the counter is inceremented 
00080    by the number of instructions in the basic block. */
00081 void bb_tracker (long m_pc, int m_num_inst);
00082 
00083 
00084 /* basic block element */ 
00085 typedef struct node {
00086   int count;
00087   int bb_id;
00088   long pc;
00089   struct node * next;
00090 } bb_node;
